Verses: 1 naan En Kaavalile Thariththu, Aranile Nilaikondirundhu, Avar Enakku Enna Solluvaarendrum, Avar Ennaik Kandikkumpodhu Naan Enna Uththaravu Solluvenendrum Gavaniththup Paarppen Endren.
2 appozhudhu Karththar Enakkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Nee Dharisanaththai Ezhudhi, Adhaik Kadandhodugiravan Vaasikkumpadip Palagaigalile Theerkkamaaga Varai.

3 kuriththakaalaththukku Dharisanam Innum Vaikkappattirukkiradhu; Mudivile Adhu Vilangum, Adhu Poi Sollaadhu; Adhu Thaamadhiththaalum Adharkuk Kaaththiru; Adhu Nichchayamaai Varum, Adhu Thaamadhippadhillai.
4 idho, Agangaariyaayirukkiraane, Avanudaiya Aaththumaa Avanukkul Semmaiyaanadhalla; Than Visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaan Pizhaippaan.

5 avan Madhubaanaththinaal Akkiramancheydhu Agangaariyaagi, Veettile Thariyaamal, Avan Than Aaththumaavaip Paadhaalaththaippola Virivaakkith Thirupthiyaagaamal, Maranaththukku Samaanamaai Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Than Vasamaaga Serththu, Sagala Janangalaiyum Thannidamaagak Koottikkondaalum,

6 ivargalellaarum Avanperil Oru Pazhamozhiyaiyum, Avanukku Virodhamaana Vasaichchollaiyum Vasaniththu, Thannudaiyadhallaadhadhaith Thanakkaaga Serththukkollugiravanukku Aiyo Endrum, Adhu Endhamattum Nirkum Endrum, Avan Thanmel Kaliman Sumaiyaiyallavaa Sumaththikkollugiraan Endrum Solluvaargal.
7 unnaik Kadippavargal Sadidhiyaai Ezhumbuvadhum, Unnai Alaikkazhippavargal Vizhippadhumillaiyo? Nee Avargalukku Sooraiyaagaayo?
8 nee Anegam Jaadhigalaik Kollaiyittapadiyinaal Janangalil Meedhiyaana Yaavarum Nee Sindhina Manusharaththaththinimiththamum Nee Seydha Kodumaiyinimiththamum Unnaik Kollaiyiduvaargal.
9 theemaiyin Vallamaikkuth Thappavendumendru Than Koottai Uyaraththile Vaikkumpadikku, Than Veettukkup Pollaadha Aadhaayaththaith Thedugiravanukku Aiyo!
10 anega Janangalai Vettippottadhinaal Un Veettukku Vetkamundaaga Aalosanaipanninaai; Un Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhaai.
11 kallu Suvarilirundhu Kooppidum, Uththiram Machchilirundhu Saatchiyidum.
12 raththappazhigalaale Pattanaththaik Katti, Aniyaayaththinaale Nagaraththai Balappaduththugiravanukku Aiyo!
13 idho, Janangal Akkinikku Iraiyaaga Uzhaiththu, Janangal Virudhaavaaga Ilaiththuppogiradhu Karththarudaiya Seyal Allavo?
14 samuththiram Jalaththinaal Niraindhirukkiradhupol, Boomi Karththarudaiya Magimaiyai Arigira Arivinaal Niraindhirukkum.
15 than Thozharukkuk Kudikkakkoduththuth Than Thuruththiyai Avargalandaiyile Vaiththu, Avargaludaiya Nirvaanangalaip Paarkkumpadikku, Avargalai Verikkappannugiravanukku Aiyo.

16 nee Magimaiyinaal Alla, Lachchaiyinaal Nirappappaduvaai; Neeyum Kudiththu Viruththasedhanamillaadhavan Endru Vilangu; Karththarudaiya Valadhukaiyil Irukkira Paaththiram Unnidaththirkuth Thirumbum; Un Magimaiyinmel Lachchaiyaana Vaandhipannuvaai.

17 leebanonukku Seydha Kodumai Unnai Moodum; Sindhina Manusharaththaththinimiththamum Dhesaththirkum Pattanaththirkum Adhin Kudigal Ellaarukkum Seydha Kodumaiyinimiththamum Mirugangal Seyyum Paazhkkadippu Unnaik Kalangappannum.
